item.title: Meta 因滥用分类广告优势被欧盟罚款 7.98 亿欧元
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司因将其 Facebook Marketplace 服务与其庞大的社交网络捆绑在一起而被欧盟监管机构处以 7.98 亿欧元（8.41 亿美元）的罚款，这是该美国科技巨头首次因违反欧盟反垄断法而受到处罚。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. was hit with a €798 million ($841 million) fine by European Union regulators by tying its Facebook Marketplace service to its sprawling social network, the US tech giant’s first ever penalty for EU antitrust violations.】

item.title: 中国铜买家削减年度合同，市场处于波动之中
item.description: 铜曾是全球金属市场的风向标，而中国的铜进口商们正在通过年度供应谈判来控制他们的购买吨数，转而选择现货供应。【原文：China’s copper importers are reining in the amount of tonnage they buy through annual supply negotiations, once a bellwether for the global metal market, and opting for spot supplies instead.】

item.title: 印度央行行长任期未定，降息希望渺茫
item.description: 印度央行行长的合同还有不到一个月就将结束，其未来的不确定性给利率预期增添了另一层复杂性。【原文：Uncertainty about the future of India’s central bank governor, whose contract ends in less than a month, is adding another layer of complexity to interest rate expectations.】

item.title: 来自利马亚太经合组织首席执行官峰会的最新消息
item.description: 11月11日，在秘鲁利马，人们从利马会议中心入口处走过，参加亚太经济合作组织峰会。摄影师：Cris Bouroncle/法新社/盖蒂图片社【原文：People walk by the entrance of the Lima Convention Center for the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation Summit in Lima, Peru, on Nov. 11. Photographer: Cris Bouroncle/AFP/Getty Images】

item.title: 石油需求增长将进一步下滑
item.description:
欧佩克再次下调了预期，但仍比国际能源署乐观得多。【原文：

OPEC has again trimmed estimates, yet it’s still much more optimistic than the IEA.

】

item.title: Tapestry 正在回购为收购 Capri 而发行的债券
item.description: Tapestry Inc. 因反垄断压力而放弃收购 Capri Holdings，并计划回购 61 亿美元的债券，以资助现已受阻的收购。【原文：Tapestry Inc. is planning to buy back $6.1 billion of bonds it sold to fund its now blocked purchase of Capri Holdings, after abandoning the deal due to antitrust pressure.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为风险管理是 10 月降息的关键
item.description: 欧洲中央银行上个月决定提前降息的一个重要原因是风险管理方面的考虑。【原文：Risk-management considerations were a key reason the European Central Bank decided to bring forward an interest-rate cut last month, an account of their last policy decision showed.】

item.title: 与马斯克一样，钾肥公司 K+S 也因德国工人生病而陷入困境
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克并不是唯一一个注意到德国员工请病假比平时多的人。【原文：Elon Musk isn’t the only one noticing that staff in Germany are calling in sick more than usual.】

item.title: 包裹锁亿万富翁就行李费向廉价航空公司发出挑战
item.description: 波兰亿万富翁拉法尔-布若斯卡（Rafal Brzoska）正在挑战航空公司收取额外行李费的政策。【原文：Polish billionaire Rafal Brzoska is challenging airlines’ policy of charging extra fees for luggage.】

item.title: 德国 EON 和 RWE 拒绝接受恢复核能的呼吁
item.description: 德国公司 EON SE 和 RWE AG 驳回了重启其退役核电站的呼吁，因为在二月份大选之前，能源成为了一个政治问题。【原文：German companies EON SE and RWE AG dismissed calls to restart their decommissioned nuclear power plants, as the energy source becomes a political issue ahead of elections in February.】

item.title: 私募股权投资找到另一种保持资金流入的方法
item.description:
收购公司以其投资组合为抵押借款引发了争议。银行现在正在为发放这些贷款的基金提供支持。【原文：

Buyout firms have sparked controversy by borrowing money against their portfolios. Banks are now backing the funds who make those loans.

】

item.title: 匈牙利就央行行长变动向市场作出保证
item.description: 匈牙利政府采取行动安抚投资者，因为他们预计明年央行领导层换届后货币政策将发生转变。【原文：Hungary’s government moved to reassure investors who have been anticipating a shift in monetary policy after a change of leadership at the central bank next year.】

item.title: 挪威央行称外汇储备变动可能不会改变克朗的游戏规则
item.description: 挪威央行的一位高级官员表示，对挪威央行外汇储备管理方式的潜在调整可能不会改变游戏规则，但却能提振岌岌可危的挪威克朗。【原文：A potential tweak to the way in which the Norges Bank manages its foreign exchange reserves may not be a game changer when it comes to boosting the ailing Norwegian krone, according to a senior official at the Norwegian central bank.】

item.title: 伦敦资本收购案；英国法官裁定金融老板实施庞氏骗局
item.description: 伦敦一名法官裁定，London Capital & Finance Plc 的老板们实施了一个庞氏骗局，从散户投资者那里收取了数亿英镑，并将其中大部分花在了自己身上。【原文：Bosses at London Capital & Finance Plc ran a ponzi scheme to collect hundreds of millions of pounds from retail investors, spending much of it on themselves, a London judge ruled.】

item.title: 交易员押注欧洲央行下月降息 75 个基点，赢利十倍
item.description: 一位交易员押注欧洲央行将在下个月大幅降息，而在唐纳德-特朗普的政党赢得美国国会参众两院的控制权后，这一预测变得更加可信。【原文：A trader is betting the European Central Bank will deliver a jumbo interest-rate cut next month, a scenario becoming more plausible after Donald Trump’s party won control of both chambers of the US Congress.】

item.title: Meta 这一周的挫折预示着未来将是艰难的时期
item.description: 本周对 Meta 来说是不平静的一周，但首先...【原文：It’s been a rough week for Meta, but first…】

item.title: 美元的持久魅力在中国主权债券销售中显现
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们将探讨中国对使用美元的持久承诺。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at China’s enduring commitment to using the dollar. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普关税如何将美国圣诞灯采购从中国转移到柬埔寨
item.description: 下次当您看到圣诞灯时，请想想它们能为过去和未来的贸易战提供哪些启示。【原文：Next time you see Christmas lights, consider the lessons they can teach about trade wars of the past and future.】

item.title: 库格勒称美联储必须同时关注通胀和就业目标
item.description: 美联储理事阿德里安娜-库格勒（Adriana Kugler）表示，决策者必须继续关注央行的通胀和就业目标，并指出劳动力市场正在降温，实现美联储 2% 通胀目标的进程正在放缓。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler said policymakers must keep their focus on both the central bank’s inflation and employment goals, pointing to a cooling labor market and slower progress toward the Fed’s 2% inflation target.】

item.title: MinRes 称已向与埃里森有关联的实体支付 3,200 万澳元租金
item.description: 矿产资源有限公司（Mineral Resources Ltd.）向澳大利亚证券交易所提交的文件显示，该公司在 2007 年至 2024 年期间向与其总经理克里斯-埃里森（Chris Ellison）有关联的实体支付的租金远远超过 3400 万澳元（2190 万美元）。【原文：Mineral Resources Ltd. said it paid rent to entities associated with its Managing Director Chris Ellison amounting to well over A$34 million ($21.9 million) between 2007 to 2024, according to a filing with the Australian Securities Exchange.】

item.title: 特朗普当选助推美元走强，兰德改革方案摇摆不定
item.description: 南非兰特陷入了一场拉锯战，乐观主义者期望该国的经济改革能在长期内见效，而悲观主义者则因唐纳德-特朗普的政策建议推动美元走高而抛售南非兰特。【原文：South Africa’s rand is caught in a tug-of-war between optimists who expect the country’s economic reforms to pay off in the longer term, and pessimists selling it off as Donald Trump’s policy proposals drive the dollar higher.】

item.title: 信贷风险创下 26 年新低，显示欣喜情绪无处不在
item.description: 因唐纳德-特朗普的胜利而欣喜若狂的不仅仅是股市。【原文：It’s not just stock markets that are euphoric over Donald Trump’s victory.】

item.title: 价值 4 万亿美元的海湾基金和运作这些基金的权力经纪人
item.description: 本周，中东主权财富基金通常平静的世界发生了一系列变化。卡塔尔为其价值 5100 亿美元的基金任命了新的首席执行官，科威特正在更换其 1 万亿美元国家支持投资者的负责人，而阿布扎比投资局正在进行战略调整。【原文：The normally quiet world of Middle Eastern sovereign wealth funds was jolted by a series of changes this week. Qatar named a new chief executive officer for its $510 billion fund, Kuwait is replacing the head of its $1 trillion state-backed investor, while the Abu Dhabi Investment Authority is in the midst of a strategic shift.】

item.title: 摩根大通在印度新枢纽设立衍生产品开发部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co., in a first for any global bank, has set up a unit to develop derivative products in India’s newest international hub, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 前德意志交易所工作人员在内幕交易案中被定罪
item.description: 一名德国证券交易所前雇员因秘密利用法兰克福证券交易所从上市公司获得的非公开信息进行交易而被判处缓刑，并必须支付 16.3 万欧元。【原文：A former Deutsche Boerse AG employee was handed a suspended sentence and must pay €163,000 for secretly trading on non-public information the Frankfurt stock exchange received from listed companies.】

item.title: 鱿鱼游戏 "卷土重来，考验 Netflix 全球营销实力
item.description:
主创人员黄东赫讨论了将于 12 月 26 日首播的第二季乌托邦惊悚片的制作过程

。【原文：

Creator Hwang Dong-hyuk discusses making season two of the dystopian thriller, which debuts Dec. 26

】

item.title: 特朗普将 "破坏球 "瞄准气候政策
item.description:
当选总统表示，他将退出巴黎气候协定，并提高石油和天然气产量。【原文：

The president-elect has said he’ll exit the Paris climate accord and ramp up oil and gas production.

】

item.title: 纽约市养老基金决定加入气候金融集团
item.description: 纽约市的一家养老基金正在加入一个气候金融集团，加倍努力应对全球变暖带来的投资风险。【原文：One of New York City’s pension funds is joining a climate-finance group as it double downs on efforts to address investment risks from global warming.】

item.title: Palantir 股价不敌越来越多持怀疑态度的分析师
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc. 的股价持续走高，令怀疑论者感到困惑，即使华尔街的一些人对其天价估值和公司收入增长的可持续性提出质疑。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. is confounding skeptics, with the stock continuing to push higher even as some on Wall Street question its sky-high valuation and the sustainability of the company’s revenue growth.】

item.title: 增长前景改善，英国实际收益率创 2022 年以来新高
item.description: 由于人们猜测唐纳德-特朗普在美国的政策将推动全球经济增长，英国通胀挂钩基准债券的收益率两年来首次达到 1%。【原文：The yield on UK inflation-linked benchmark bonds hit 1% for the first time in two years, as speculation mounts that Donald Trump’s policies in the US will provide a boost to global economic growth.】
